00126 
00144 MtrNode *
00145 Cudd_MakeTreeNode(
00146   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00147   unsigned int  low /* index of the first group variable */,
00148   unsigned int  size /* number of variables in the group */,
00149   unsigned int  type /* MTR_DEFAULT or MTR_FIXED */)
00150 {
00151     MtrNode *group;
00152     MtrNode *tree;
00153     unsigned int level;
00154 
00155     /* If the variable does not exist yet, the position is assumed to be
00156     ** the same as the index. Therefore, applications that rely on
00157     ** Cudd_bddNewVarAtLevel or Cudd_addNewVarAtLevel to create new
00158     ** variables have to create the variables before they group them.
00159     */
00160     level = (low < (unsigned int) dd->size) ? dd->perm[low] : low;
00161 
00162     if (level + size - 1> (int) MTR_MAXHIGH)
00163         return(NULL);
00164 
00165     /* If the tree does not exist yet, create it. */
00166     tree = dd->tree;
00167     if (tree == NULL) {
00168         dd->tree = tree = Mtr_InitGroupTree(0, dd->size);
00169         if (tree == NULL)
00170             return(NULL);
00171         tree->index = dd->invperm[0];
00172     }
00173 
00174     /* Extend the upper bound of the tree if necessary. This allows the
00175     ** application to create groups even before the variables are created.
00176     */
00177     tree->size = ddMax(tree->size, ddMax(level + size, (unsigned) dd->size));
00178 
00179     /* Create the group. */
00180     group = Mtr_MakeGroup(tree, level, size, type);
00181     if (group == NULL)
00182         return(NULL);
00183 
00184     /* Initialize the index field to the index of the variable currently
00185     ** in position low. This field will be updated by the reordering
00186     ** procedure to provide a handle to the group once it has been moved.
00187     */
00188     group->index = (MtrHalfWord) low;
00189 
00190     return(group);
00191 
00192 } /* end of Cudd_MakeTreeNode */

00199 
00212 int
00213 cuddTreeSifting(
00214   DdManager * table /* DD table */,
00215   Cudd_ReorderingType method /* reordering method for the groups of leaves */)
00216 {
00217     int i;
00218     int nvars;
00219     int result;
00220     int tempTree;
00221 
00222     /* If no tree is provided we create a temporary one in which all
00223     ** variables are in a single group. After reordering this tree is
00224     ** destroyed.
00225     */
00226     tempTree = table->tree == NULL;
00227     if (tempTree) {
00228         table->tree = Mtr_InitGroupTree(0,table->size);
00229         table->tree->index = table->invperm[0];
00230     }
00231     nvars = table->size;
00232 
00233 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00234     if (pr > 0 && !tempTree) (void) fprintf(stdout,"cuddTreeSifting:");
00235     Mtr_PrintGroups(table->tree,pr <= 0);
00236 #endif
00237 
00238 #ifdef DD_STATS
00239     extsymmcalls = 0;
00240     extsymm = 0;
00241     secdiffcalls = 0;
00242     secdiff = 0;
00243     secdiffmisfire = 0;
00244 
00245     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00246     if (!tempTree)
00247         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:IM_NODES  %8d: group tree nodes\n",
00248                        ddCountInternalMtrNodes(table,table->tree));
00249 #endif
00250 
00251     /* Initialize the group of each subtable to itself. Initially
00252     ** there are no groups. Groups are created according to the tree
00253     ** structure in postorder fashion.
00254     */
00255     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++)
00256         table->subtables[i].next = i;
00257 
00258     /* Reorder. */
00259     result = ddTreeSiftingAux(table, table->tree, method);
00260 
00261 #ifdef DD_STATS         /* print stats */
00262     if (!tempTree && method == CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT &&
00263         (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7 ||
00264          table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK5)) {
00265         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nextsymmcalls = %d\n",extsymmcalls);
00266         (void) fprintf(stdout,"extsymm = %d",extsymm);
00267     }
00268     if (!tempTree && method == CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT &&
00269         table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7) {
00270         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nsecdiffcalls = %d\n",secdiffcalls);
00271         (void) fprintf(stdout,"secdiff = %d\n",secdiff);
00272         (void) fprintf(stdout,"secdiffmisfire = %d",secdiffmisfire);
00273     }
00274 #endif
00275 
00276     if (tempTree)
00277         Cudd_FreeTree(table);
00278     return(result);
00279 
00280 } /* end of cuddTreeSifting */

00298 static int
00299 ddTreeSiftingAux(
00300   DdManager * table,
00301   MtrNode * treenode,
00302   Cudd_ReorderingType method)
00303 {
00304     MtrNode  *auxnode;
00305     int res;
00306     Cudd_AggregationType saveCheck;
00307 
00308 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00309     Mtr_PrintGroups(treenode,1);
00310 #endif
00311 
00312     auxnode = treenode;
00313     while (auxnode != NULL) {
00314         if (auxnode->child != NULL) {
00315             if (!ddTreeSiftingAux(table, auxnode->child, method))
00316                 return(0);
00317             saveCheck = table->groupcheck;
00318             table->groupcheck = CUDD_NO_CHECK;
00319             res = ddReorderChildren(table, auxnode, CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT);
00320             table->groupcheck = saveCheck;
00321             if (res == 0)
00322                 return(0);
00323         } else if (auxnode->size > 1) {
00324             if (!ddReorderChildren(table, auxnode, method))
00325                 return(0);
00326         }
00327         auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00328     }
00329 
00330     return(1);
00331 
00332 } /* end of ddTreeSiftingAux */

00346 static int
00347 ddCountInternalMtrNodes(
00348   DdManager * table,
00349   MtrNode * treenode)
00350 {
00351     MtrNode *auxnode;
00352     int     count,nodeCount;
00353 
00354 
00355     nodeCount = 0;
00356     auxnode = treenode;
00357     while (auxnode != NULL) {
00358         if (!(MTR_TEST(auxnode,MTR_TERMINAL))) {
00359             nodeCount++;
00360             count = ddCountInternalMtrNodes(table,auxnode->child);
00361             nodeCount += count;
00362         }
00363         auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00364     }
00365 
00366     return(nodeCount);
00367 
00368 } /* end of ddCountInternalMtrNodes */
00369 #endif

00371 
00386 static int
00387 ddReorderChildren(
00388   DdManager * table,
00389   MtrNode * treenode,
00390   Cudd_ReorderingType method)
00391 {
00392     int lower;
00393     int upper;
00394     int result;
00395     unsigned int initialSize;
00396 
00397     ddFindNodeHiLo(table,treenode,&lower,&upper);
00398     /* If upper == -1 these variables do not exist yet. */
00399     if (upper == -1)
00400         return(1);
00401 
00402     if (treenode->flags == MTR_FIXED) {
00403         result = 1;
00404     } else {
00405 #ifdef DD_STATS
00406         (void) fprintf(stdout," ");
00407 #endif
00408         switch (method) {
00409         case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM:
00410         case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT:
00411             result = cuddSwapping(table,lower,upper,method);
00412             break;
00413         case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT:
00414             result = cuddSifting(table,lower,upper);
00415             break;
00416         case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT_CONVERGE:
00417             do {
00418                 initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00419                 result = cuddSifting(table,lower,upper);
00420                 if (initialSize <= table->keys - table->isolated)
00421                     break;
00422 #ifdef DD_STATS
00423                 else
00424                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00425 #endif
00426             } while (result != 0);
00427             break;
00428         case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT:
00429             result = cuddSymmSifting(table,lower,upper);
00430             break;
00431         case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT_CONV:
00432             result = cuddSymmSiftingConv(table,lower,upper);
00433             break;
00434         case CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT:
00435             if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_NO_CHECK) {
00436                 result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddNoCheck);
00437             } else if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK5) {
00438                 result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddExtSymmCheck);
00439             } else if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7) {
00440                 result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddExtSymmCheck);
00441             } else {
00442                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Unknown group ckecking method\n");
00443                 result = 0;
00444             }
00445             break;
00446         case CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT_CONV:
00447             do {
00448                 initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00449                 if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_NO_CHECK) {
00450                     result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddNoCheck);
00451                 } else if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK5) {
00452                     result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddExtSymmCheck);
00453                 } else if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7) {
00454                     result = ddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper,ddExtSymmCheck);
00455                 } else {
00456                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"Unknown group ckecking method\n");
00457                     result = 0;
00458                 }
00459 #ifdef DD_STATS
00460                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00461 #endif
00462                 result = cuddWindowReorder(table,lower,upper,CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW4);
00463                 if (initialSize <= table->keys - table->isolated)
00464                     break;
00465 #ifdef DD_STATS
00466                 else
00467                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00468 #endif
00469             } while (result != 0);
00470             break;
00471         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW2:
00472         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW3:
00473         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW4:
00474         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW2_CONV:
00475         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW3_CONV:
00476         case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW4_CONV:
00477             result = cuddWindowReorder(table,lower,upper,method);
00478             break;
00479         case CUDD_REORDER_ANNEALING:
00480             result = cuddAnnealing(table,lower,upper);
00481             break;
00482         case CUDD_REORDER_GENETIC:
00483             result = cuddGa(table,lower,upper);
00484             break;
00485         case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR:
00486             result = cuddLinearAndSifting(table,lower,upper);
00487             break;
00488         case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR_CONVERGE:
00489             do {
00490                 initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00491                 result = cuddLinearAndSifting(table,lower,upper);
00492                 if (initialSize <= table->keys - table->isolated)
00493                     break;
00494 #ifdef DD_STATS
00495                 else
00496                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00497 #endif
00498             } while (result != 0);
00499             break;
00500         case CUDD_REORDER_EXACT:
00501             result = cuddExact(table,lower,upper);
00502             break;
00503         default:
00504             return(0);
00505         }
00506     }
00507 
00508     /* Create a single group for all the variables that were sifted,
00509     ** so that they will be treated as a single block by successive
00510     ** invocations of ddGroupSifting.
00511     */
00512     ddMergeGroups(table,treenode,lower,upper);
00513 
00514 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00515     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddReorderChildren:");
00516 #endif
00517 
00518     return(result);
00519 
00520 } /* end of ddReorderChildren */
00521 
00522 
00538 static void
00539 ddFindNodeHiLo(
00540   DdManager * table,
00541   MtrNode * treenode,
00542   int * lower,
00543   int * upper)
00544 {
00545     int low;
00546     int high;
00547 
00548     /* Check whether no variables in this group already exist.
00549     ** If so, return immediately. The calling procedure will know from
00550     ** the values of upper that no reordering is needed.
00551     */
00552     if ((int) treenode->low >= table->size) {
00553         *lower = table->size;
00554         *upper = -1;
00555         return;
00556     }
00557 
00558     *lower = low = (unsigned int) table->perm[treenode->index];
00559     high = (int) (low + treenode->size - 1);
00560 
00561     if (high >= table->size) {
00562         /* This is the case of a partially existing group. The aim is to
00563         ** reorder as many variables as safely possible.  If the tree
00564         ** node is terminal, we just reorder the subset of the group
00565         ** that is currently in existence.  If the group has
00566         ** subgroups, then we only reorder those subgroups that are
00567         ** fully instantiated.  This way we avoid breaking up a group.
00568         */
00569         MtrNode *auxnode = treenode->child;
00570         if (auxnode == NULL) {
00571             *upper = (unsigned int) table->size - 1;
00572         } else {
00573             /* Search the subgroup that strands the table->size line.
00574             ** If the first group starts at 0 and goes past table->size
00575             ** upper will get -1, thus correctly signaling that no reordering
00576             ** should take place.
00577             */
00578             while (auxnode != NULL) {
00579                 int thisLower = table->perm[auxnode->low];
00580                 int thisUpper = thisLower + auxnode->size - 1;
00581                 if (thisUpper >= table->size && thisLower < table->size)
00582                     *upper = (unsigned int) thisLower - 1;
00583                 auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00584             }
00585         }
00586     } else {
00587         /* Normal case: All the variables of the group exist. */
00588         *upper = (unsigned int) high;
00589     }
00590 
00591 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00592     /* Make sure that all variables in group are contiguous. */
00593     assert(treenode->size >= *upper - *lower + 1);
00594 #endif
00595 
00596     return;
00597 
00598 } /* end of ddFindNodeHiLo */
00599

00613 static int
00614 ddUniqueCompareGroup(
00615   int * ptrX,
00616   int * ptrY)
00617 {
00618 #if 0
00619     if (entry[*ptrY] == entry[*ptrX]) {
00620         return((*ptrX) - (*ptrY));
00621     }
00622 #endif
00623     return(entry[*ptrY] - entry[*ptrX]);
00624 
00625 } /* end of ddUniqueCompareGroup */

00627 
00641 static int
00642 ddGroupSifting(
00643   DdManager * table,
00644   int  lower,
00645   int  upper,
00646   int (*checkFunction)(DdManager *, int, int))
00647 {
00648     int         *var;
00649     int         i,j,x,xInit;
00650     int         nvars;
00651     int         classes;
00652     int         result;
00653     int         *sifted;
00654     int         merged;
00655     int         dissolve;
00656 #ifdef DD_STATS
00657     unsigned    previousSize;
00658 #endif
00659     int         xindex;
00660 
00661     nvars = table->size;
00662 
00663     /* Order variables to sift. */
00664     entry = NULL;
00665     sifted = NULL;
00666     var = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00667     if (var == NULL) {
00668         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00669         goto ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00670     }
00671     entry = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00672     if (entry == NULL) {
00673         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00674         goto ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00675     }
00676     sifted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00677     if (sifted == NULL) {
00678         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00679         goto ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00680     }
00681 
00682     /* Here we consider only one representative for each group. */
00683     for (i = 0, classes = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00684         sifted[i] = 0;
00685         x = table->perm[i];
00686         if ((unsigned) x >= table->subtables[x].next) {
00687             entry[i] = table->subtables[x].keys;
00688             var[classes] = i;
00689             classes++;
00690         }
00691     }
00692 
00693     qsort((void *)var,classes,sizeof(int),(int (*)(const void *, const void *))ddUniqueCompareGroup);
00694 
00695     /* Now sift. */
00696     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar,classes); i++) {
00697         if (ddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00698             break;
00699         xindex = var[i];
00700         if (sifted[xindex] == 1) /* variable already sifted as part of group */
00701             continue;
00702         x = table->perm[xindex]; /* find current level of this variable */
00703         if (x < lower || x > upper)
00704             continue;
00705 #ifdef DD_STATS
00706         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00707 #endif
00708 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00709         /* x is bottom of group */
00710         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtables[x].next);
00711 #endif
00712         if ((unsigned) x == table->subtables[x].next) {
00713             dissolve = 1;
00714             result = ddGroupSiftingAux(table,x,lower,upper,checkFunction);
00715         } else {
00716             dissolve = 0;
00717             result = ddGroupSiftingAux(table,x,lower,upper,ddNoCheck);
00718         }
00719         if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00720 
00721         /* check for aggregation */
00722         merged = 0;
00723         if (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7) {
00724             x = table->perm[xindex]; /* find current level */
00725             if ((unsigned) x == table->subtables[x].next) { /* not part of a group */
00726                 if (x != upper && sifted[table->invperm[x+1]] == 0 &&
00727                 (unsigned) x+1 == table->subtables[x+1].next) {
00728                     if (ddSecDiffCheck(table,x,x+1)) {
00729                         merged =1;
00730                         ddCreateGroup(table,x,x+1);
00731                     }
00732                 }
00733                 if (x != lower && sifted[table->invperm[x-1]] == 0 &&
00734                 (unsigned) x-1 == table->subtables[x-1].next) {
00735                     if (ddSecDiffCheck(table,x-1,x)) {
00736                         merged =1;
00737                         ddCreateGroup(table,x-1,x);
00738                     }
00739                 }
00740             }
00741         }
00742 
00743         if (merged) { /* a group was created */
00744             /* move x to bottom of group */
00745             while ((unsigned) x < table->subtables[x].next)
00746                 x = table->subtables[x].next;
00747             /* sift */
00748             result = ddGroupSiftingAux(table,x,lower,upper,ddNoCheck);
00749             if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00750 #ifdef DD_STATS
00751             if (table->keys < previousSize + table->isolated) {
00752                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"_");
00753             } else if (table->keys > previousSize + table->isolated) {
00754                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"^");
00755             } else {
00756                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"*");
00757             }
00758             fflush(stdout);
00759         } else {
00760             if (table->keys < previousSize + table->isolated) {
00761                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00762             } else if (table->keys > previousSize + table->isolated) {
00763                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"+");
00764             } else {
00765                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00766             }
00767             fflush(stdout);
00768 #endif
00769         }
00770 
00771         /* Mark variables in the group just sifted. */
00772         x = table->perm[xindex];
00773         if ((unsigned) x != table->subtables[x].next) {
00774             xInit = x;
00775             do {
00776                 j = table->invperm[x];
00777                 sifted[j] = 1;
00778                 x = table->subtables[x].next;
00779             } while (x != xInit);
00780 
00781             /* Dissolve the group if it was created. */
00782             if (dissolve) {
00783                 do {
00784                     j = table->subtables[x].next;
00785                     table->subtables[x].next = x;
00786                     x = j;
00787                 } while (x != xInit);
00788             }
00789         }
00790 
00791 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00792         if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupSifting:");
00793 #endif
00794     } /* for */
00795 
00796     FREE(sifted);
00797     FREE(var);
00798     FREE(entry);
00799 
00800     return(1);
00801 
00802 ddGroupSiftingOutOfMem:
00803     if (entry != NULL)  FREE(entry);
00804     if (var != NULL)    FREE(var);
00805     if (sifted != NULL) FREE(sifted);
00806 
00807     return(0);
00808 
00809 } /* end of ddGroupSifting */
00810 
00811 
00824 static void
00825 ddCreateGroup(
00826   DdManager * table,
00827   int  x,
00828   int  y)
00829 {
00830     int  gybot;
00831 
00832 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00833     assert(y == x+1);
00834 #endif
00835 
00836     /* Find bottom of second group. */
00837     gybot = y;
00838     while ((unsigned) gybot < table->subtables[gybot].next)
00839         gybot = table->subtables[gybot].next;
00840 
00841     /* Link groups. */
00842     table->subtables[x].next = y;
00843     table->subtables[gybot].next = x;
00844 
00845     return;
00846 
00847 } /* ddCreateGroup */
00848 
00849 
00865 static int
00866 ddGroupSiftingAux(
00867   DdManager * table,
00868   int  x,
00869   int  xLow,
00870   int  xHigh,
00871   int (*checkFunction)(DdManager *, int, int))
00872 {
00873     Move *move;
00874     Move *moves;        /* list of moves */
00875     int  initialSize;
00876     int  result;
00877     int  y;
00878     int  topbot;
00879 
00880 
00881 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00882     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupSiftingAux from %d to %d\n",xLow,xHigh);
00883     assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtables[x].next); /* x is bottom of group */
00884 #endif
00885 
00886     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00887     moves = NULL;
00888 
00889     /* If we have a singleton, we check for aggregation in both
00890     ** directions before we sift.
00891     */
00892     if ((unsigned) x == table->subtables[x].next) {
00893         /* Will go down first, unless x == xHigh:
00894         ** Look for aggregation above x.
00895         */
00896         for (y = x; y > xLow; y--) {
00897             if (!checkFunction(table,y-1,y))
00898                 break;
00899             topbot = table->subtables[y-1].next; /* find top of y-1's group */
00900             table->subtables[y-1].next = y;
00901             table->subtables[x].next = topbot; /* x is bottom of group so its */
00902                                                /* next is top of y-1's group */
00903             y = topbot + 1; /* add 1 for y--; new y is top of group */
00904         }
00905         /* Will go up first unless x == xlow:
00906         ** Look for aggregation below x.
00907         */
00908         for (y = x; y < xHigh; y++) {
00909             if (!checkFunction(table,y,y+1))
00910                 break;
00911             /* find bottom of y+1's group */
00912             topbot = y + 1;
00913             while ((unsigned) topbot < table->subtables[topbot].next) {
00914                 topbot = table->subtables[topbot].next;
00915             }
00916             table->subtables[topbot].next = table->subtables[y].next;
00917             table->subtables[y].next = y + 1;
00918             y = topbot - 1; /* subtract 1 for y++; new y is bottom of group */
00919         }
00920     }
00921 
00922     /* Now x may be in the middle of a group.
00923     ** Find bottom of x's group.
00924     */
00925     while ((unsigned) x < table->subtables[x].next)
00926         x = table->subtables[x].next;
00927 
00928     if (x == xLow) { /* Sift down */
00929 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00930         /* x must be a singleton */
00931         assert((unsigned) x == table->subtables[x].next);
00932 #endif
00933         if (x == xHigh) return(1);      /* just one variable */
00934 
00935         if (!ddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,checkFunction,&moves))
00936             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00937         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00938 
00939         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00940         result = ddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00941 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00942         assert(table->keys - table->isolated <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00943 #endif
00944         if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00945 
00946     } else if (cuddNextHigh(table,x) > xHigh) { /* Sift up */
00947 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00948         /* x is bottom of group */
00949         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtables[x].next);
00950 #endif
00951         /* Find top of x's group */
00952         x = table->subtables[x].next;
00953 
00954         if (!ddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,checkFunction,&moves))
00955             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00956         /* at this point x == xLow, unless early term */
00957 
00958         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00959         result = ddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00960 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00961         assert(table->keys - table->isolated <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00962 #endif
00963         if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00964 
00965     } else if (x - xLow > xHigh - x) { /* must go down first: shorter */
00966         if (!ddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,checkFunction,&moves))
00967             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00968         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00969 
00970         /* Find top of group */
00971         if (moves) {
00972             x = moves->y;
00973         }
00974         while ((unsigned) x < table->subtables[x].next)
00975             x = table->subtables[x].next;
00976         x = table->subtables[x].next;
00977 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00978         /* x should be the top of a group */
00979         assert((unsigned) x <= table->subtables[x].next);
00980 #endif
00981 
00982         if (!ddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,checkFunction,&moves))
00983             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00984 
00985         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00986         result = ddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00987 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00988         assert(table->keys - table->isolated <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00989 #endif
00990         if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00991 
00992     } else { /* moving up first: shorter */
00993         /* Find top of x's group */
00994         x = table->subtables[x].next;
00995 
00996         if (!ddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,checkFunction,&moves))
00997             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00998         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00999 
01000         if (moves) {
01001             x = moves->x;
01002         }
01003         while ((unsigned) x < table->subtables[x].next)
01004             x = table->subtables[x].next;
01005 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01006         /* x is bottom of a group */
01007         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtables[x].next);
01008 #endif
01009 
01010         if (!ddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,checkFunction,&moves))
01011             goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01012 
01013         /* move backward and stop at best position */
01014         result = ddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
01015 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01016         assert(table->keys - table->isolated <= (unsigned) initialSize);
01017 #endif
01018         if (!result) goto ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01019     }
01020 
01021     while (moves != NULL) {
01022         move = moves->next;
01023         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
01024         moves = move;
01025     }
01026 
01027     return(1);
01028 
01029 ddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem:
01030     while (moves != NULL) {
01031         move = moves->next;
01032         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
01033         moves = move;
01034     }
01035 
01036     return(0);
01037 
01038 } /* end of ddGroupSiftingAux */
01039 
01040 
01056 static int
01057 ddGroupSiftingUp(
01058   DdManager * table,
01059   int  y,
01060   int  xLow,
01061   int (*checkFunction)(DdManager *, int, int),
01062   Move ** moves)
01063 {
01064     Move *move;
01065     int  x;
01066     int  size;
01067     int  i;
01068     int  gxtop,gybot;
01069     int  limitSize;
01070     int  xindex, yindex;
01071     int  zindex;
01072     int  z;
01073     int  isolated;
01074     int  L;     /* lower bound on DD size */
01075 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01076     int  checkL;
01077 #endif
01078 
01079 
01080     yindex = table->invperm[y];
01081 
01082     /* Initialize the lower bound.
01083     ** The part of the DD below the bottom of y's group will not change.
01084     ** The part of the DD above y that does not interact with any
01085     ** variable of y's group will not change.
01086     ** The rest may vanish in the best case, except for
01087     ** the nodes at level xLow, which will not vanish, regardless.
01088     ** What we use here is not a real lower bound, because we ignore
01089     ** the interactions with all variables except y.
01090     */
01091     limitSize = L = table->keys - table->isolated;
01092     gybot = y;
01093     while ((unsigned) gybot < table->subtables[gybot].next)
01094         gybot = table->subtables[gybot].next;
01095     for (z = xLow + 1; z <= gybot; z++) {
01096         zindex = table->invperm[z];
01097         if (zindex == yindex || cuddTestInteract(table,zindex,yindex)) {
01098             isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01099             L -= table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01100         }
01101     }
01102 
01103     x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01104     while (x >= xLow && L <= limitSize) {
01105 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01106         gybot = y;
01107         while ((unsigned) gybot < table->subtables[gybot].next)
01108             gybot = table->subtables[gybot].next;
01109         checkL = table->keys - table->isolated;
01110         for (z = xLow + 1; z <= gybot; z++) {
01111             zindex = table->invperm[z];
01112             if (zindex == yindex || cuddTestInteract(table,zindex,yindex)) {
01113                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01114                 checkL -= table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01115             }
01116         }
01117         if (pr > 0 && L != checkL) {
01118             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Inaccurate lower bound: L = %d checkL = %d\n",
01119             L, checkL);
01120         }
01121 #endif
01122         gxtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01123         if (checkFunction(table,x,y)) {
01124             /* Group found, attach groups */
01125             table->subtables[x].next = y;
01126             i = table->subtables[y].next;
01127             while (table->subtables[i].next != (unsigned) y)
01128                 i = table->subtables[i].next;
01129             table->subtables[i].next = gxtop;
01130             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01131             if (move == NULL) goto ddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01132             move->x = x;
01133             move->y = y;
01134             move->flags = MTR_NEWNODE;
01135             move->size = table->keys - table->isolated;
01136             move->next = *moves;
01137             *moves = move;
01138         } else if (table->subtables[x].next == (unsigned) x &&
01139                    table->subtables[y].next == (unsigned) y) {
01140             /* x and y are self groups */
01141             xindex = table->invperm[x];
01142             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01143 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01144             assert(table->subtables[x].next == (unsigned) x);
01145             assert(table->subtables[y].next == (unsigned) y);
01146 #endif
01147             if (size == 0) goto ddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01148             /* Update the lower bound. */
01149             if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01150                 isolated = table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1;
01151                 L += table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01152             }
01153             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01154             if (move == NULL) goto ddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01155             move->x = x;
01156             move->y = y;
01157             move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
01158             move->size = size;
01159             move->next = *moves;
01160             *moves = move;
01161 
01162 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01163             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupSiftingUp (2 single groups):\n");
01164 #endif
01165             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
01166                 return(1);
01167             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01168         } else { /* Group move */
01169             size = ddGroupMove(table,x,y,moves);
01170             if (size == 0) goto ddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01171             /* Update the lower bound. */
01172             z = (*moves)->y;
01173             do {
01174                 zindex = table->invperm[z];
01175                 if (cuddTestInteract(table,zindex,yindex)) {
01176                     isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01177                     L += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01178                 }
01179                 z = table->subtables[z].next;
01180             } while (z != (int) (*moves)->y);
01181             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
01182                 return(1);
01183             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01184         }
01185         y = gxtop;
01186         x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01187     }
01188 
01189     return(1);
01190 
01191 ddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem:
01192     while (*moves != NULL) {
01193         move = (*moves)->next;
01194         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
01195         *moves = move;
01196     }
01197     return(0);
01198 
01199 } /* end of ddGroupSiftingUp */
01200 
01201 
01213 static int
01214 ddGroupSiftingDown(
01215   DdManager * table,
01216   int  x,
01217   int  xHigh,
01218   int (*checkFunction)(DdManager *, int, int),
01219   Move ** moves)
01220 {
01221     Move *move;
01222     int  y;
01223     int  size;
01224     int  limitSize;
01225     int  gxtop,gybot;
01226     int  R;     /* upper bound on node decrease */
01227     int  xindex, yindex;
01228     int  isolated;
01229     int  z;
01230     int  zindex;
01231 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01232     int  checkR;
01233 #endif
01234 
01235 
01236     /* Initialize R */
01237     xindex = table->invperm[x];
01238     gxtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01239     limitSize = size = table->keys - table->isolated;
01240     R = 0;
01241     for (z = xHigh; z > gxtop; z--) {
01242         zindex = table->invperm[z];
01243         if (zindex == xindex || cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
01244             isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01245             R += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01246         }
01247     }
01248     y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01249     while (y <= xHigh && size - R < limitSize) {
01250 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01251         gxtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01252         checkR = 0;
01253         for (z = xHigh; z > gxtop; z--) {
01254             zindex = table->invperm[z];
01255             if (zindex == xindex || cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
01256                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01257                 checkR += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01258             }
01259         }
01260         assert(R >= checkR);
01261 #endif
01262         /* Find bottom of y group. */
01263         gybot = table->subtables[y].next;
01264         while (table->subtables[gybot].next != (unsigned) y)
01265             gybot = table->subtables[gybot].next;
01266 
01267         if (checkFunction(table,x,y)) {
01268             /* Group found: attach groups and record move. */
01269             gxtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01270             table->subtables[x].next = y;
01271             table->subtables[gybot].next = gxtop;
01272             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01273             if (move == NULL) goto ddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01274             move->x = x;
01275             move->y = y;
01276             move->flags = MTR_NEWNODE;
01277             move->size = table->keys - table->isolated;
01278             move->next = *moves;
01279             *moves = move;
01280         } else if (table->subtables[x].next == (unsigned) x &&
01281                    table->subtables[y].next == (unsigned) y) {
01282             /* x and y are self groups */
01283             /* Update upper bound on node decrease. */
01284             yindex = table->invperm[y];
01285             if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01286                 isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
01287                 R -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01288             }
01289             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01290 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01291             assert(table->subtables[x].next == (unsigned) x);
01292             assert(table->subtables[y].next == (unsigned) y);
01293 #endif
01294             if (size == 0) goto ddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01295 
01296             /* Record move. */
01297             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01298             if (move == NULL) goto ddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01299             move->x = x;
01300             move->y = y;
01301             move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
01302             move->size = size;
01303             move->next = *moves;
01304             *moves = move;
01305 
01306 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01307             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupSiftingDown (2 single groups):\n");
01308 #endif
01309             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
01310                 return(1);
01311             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01312             x = y;
01313             y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01314         } else { /* Group move */
01315             /* Update upper bound on node decrease: first phase. */
01316             gxtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01317             z = gxtop + 1;
01318             do {
01319                 zindex = table->invperm[z];
01320                 if (zindex == xindex || cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
01321                     isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01322                     R -= table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01323                 }
01324                 z++;
01325             } while (z <= gybot);
01326             size = ddGroupMove(table,x,y,moves);
01327             if (size == 0) goto ddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01328             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
01329                 return(1);
01330             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01331             /* Update upper bound on node decrease: second phase. */
01332             gxtop = table->subtables[gybot].next;
01333             for (z = gxtop + 1; z <= gybot; z++) {
01334                 zindex = table->invperm[z];
01335                 if (zindex == xindex || cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
01336                     isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01337                     R += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01338                 }
01339             }
01340         }
01341         x = gybot;
01342         y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01343     }
01344 
01345     return(1);
01346 
01347 ddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem:
01348     while (*moves != NULL) {
01349         move = (*moves)->next;
01350         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
01351         *moves = move;
01352     }
01353 
01354     return(0);
01355 
01356 } /* end of ddGroupSiftingDown */
01357 
01358 
01369 static int
01370 ddGroupMove(
01371   DdManager * table,
01372   int  x,
01373   int  y,
01374   Move ** moves)
01375 {
01376     Move *move;
01377     int  size;
01378     int  i,j,xtop,xbot,xsize,ytop,ybot,ysize,newxtop;
01379     int  swapx = 0, swapy = 0;
01380 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01381     int  initialSize,bestSize;
01382 #endif
01383 
01384 #if DD_DEBUG
01385     /* We assume that x < y */
01386     assert(x < y);
01387 #endif
01388     /* Find top, bottom, and size for the two groups. */
01389     xbot = x;
01390     xtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01391     xsize = xbot - xtop + 1;
01392     ybot = y;
01393     while ((unsigned) ybot < table->subtables[ybot].next)
01394         ybot = table->subtables[ybot].next;
01395     ytop = y;
01396     ysize = ybot - ytop + 1;
01397 
01398 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01399     initialSize = bestSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01400 #endif
01401     /* Sift the variables of the second group up through the first group */
01402     for (i = 1; i <= ysize; i++) {
01403         for (j = 1; j <= xsize; j++) {
01404             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01405             if (size == 0) goto ddGroupMoveOutOfMem;
01406 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01407             if (size < bestSize)
01408                 bestSize = size;
01409 #endif
01410             swapx = x; swapy = y;
01411             y = x;
01412             x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01413         }
01414         y = ytop + i;
01415         x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01416     }
01417 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01418     if ((bestSize < initialSize) && (bestSize < size))
01419         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Missed local minimum: initialSize:%d  bestSize:%d  finalSize:%d\n",initialSize,bestSize,size);
01420 #endif
01421 
01422     /* fix groups */
01423     y = xtop; /* ytop is now where xtop used to be */
01424     for (i = 0; i < ysize - 1; i++) {
01425         table->subtables[y].next = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01426         y = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01427     }
01428     table->subtables[y].next = xtop; /* y is bottom of its group, join */
01429                                     /* it to top of its group */
01430     x = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01431     newxtop = x;
01432     for (i = 0; i < xsize - 1; i++) {
01433         table->subtables[x].next = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01434         x = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01435     }
01436     table->subtables[x].next = newxtop; /* x is bottom of its group, join */
01437                                     /* it to top of its group */
01438 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01439     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupMove:\n");
01440 #endif
01441 
01442     /* Store group move */
01443     move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01444     if (move == NULL) goto ddGroupMoveOutOfMem;
01445     move->x = swapx;
01446     move->y = swapy;
01447     move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
01448     move->size = table->keys - table->isolated;
01449     move->next = *moves;
01450     *moves = move;
01451 
01452     return(table->keys - table->isolated);
01453 
01454 ddGroupMoveOutOfMem:
01455     while (*moves != NULL) {
01456         move = (*moves)->next;
01457         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
01458         *moves = move;
01459     }
01460     return(0);
01461 
01462 } /* end of ddGroupMove */
01463 
01464 
01475 static int
01476 ddGroupMoveBackward(
01477   DdManager * table,
01478   int  x,
01479   int  y)
01480 {
01481     int size;
01482     int i,j,xtop,xbot,xsize,ytop,ybot,ysize,newxtop;
01483 
01484 
01485 #if DD_DEBUG
01486     /* We assume that x < y */
01487     assert(x < y);
01488 #endif
01489 
01490     /* Find top, bottom, and size for the two groups. */
01491     xbot = x;
01492     xtop = table->subtables[x].next;
01493     xsize = xbot - xtop + 1;
01494     ybot = y;
01495     while ((unsigned) ybot < table->subtables[ybot].next)
01496         ybot = table->subtables[ybot].next;
01497     ytop = y;
01498     ysize = ybot - ytop + 1;
01499 
01500     /* Sift the variables of the second group up through the first group */
01501     for (i = 1; i <= ysize; i++) {
01502         for (j = 1; j <= xsize; j++) {
01503             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01504             if (size == 0)
01505                 return(0);
01506             y = x;
01507             x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01508         }
01509         y = ytop + i;
01510         x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01511     }
01512 
01513     /* fix groups */
01514     y = xtop;
01515     for (i = 0; i < ysize - 1; i++) {
01516         table->subtables[y].next = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01517         y = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01518     }
01519     table->subtables[y].next = xtop; /* y is bottom of its group, join */
01520                                     /* to its top */
01521     x = cuddNextHigh(table,y);
01522     newxtop = x;
01523     for (i = 0; i < xsize - 1; i++) {
01524         table->subtables[x].next = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01525         x = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01526     }
01527     table->subtables[x].next = newxtop; /* x is bottom of its group, join */
01528                                     /* to its top */
01529 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01530     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupMoveBackward:\n");
01531 #endif
01532 
01533     return(1);
01534 
01535 } /* end of ddGroupMoveBackward */
01536 
01537 
01549 static int
01550 ddGroupSiftingBackward(
01551   DdManager * table,
01552   Move * moves,
01553   int  size)
01554 {
01555     Move *move;
01556     int  res;
01557 
01558 
01559     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01560         if (move->size < size) {
01561             size = move->size;
01562         }
01563     }
01564 
01565     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01566         if (move->size == size) return(1);
01567         if ((table->subtables[move->x].next == move->x) &&
01568         (table->subtables[move->y].next == move->y)) {
01569             res = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01570             if (!res) return(0);
01571 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01572             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"ddGroupSiftingBackward:\n");
01573             assert(table->subtables[move->x].next == move->x);
01574             assert(table->subtables[move->y].next == move->y);
01575 #endif
01576         } else { /* Group move necessary */
01577             if (move->flags == MTR_NEWNODE) {
01578                 ddDissolveGroup(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01579             } else {
01580                 res = ddGroupMoveBackward(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01581                 if (!res) return(0);
01582             }
01583         }
01584 
01585     }
01586 
01587     return(1);
01588 
01589 } /* end of ddGroupSiftingBackward */
01590 
01591 
01602 static void
01603 ddMergeGroups(
01604   DdManager * table,
01605   MtrNode * treenode,
01606   int  low,
01607   int  high)
01608 {
01609     int i;
01610     MtrNode *auxnode;
01611     int saveindex;
01612     int newindex;
01613 
01614     if (treenode != table->tree) {
01615         for (i = low; i < high; i++)
01616             table->subtables[i].next = i+1;
01617         table->subtables[high].next = low;
01618     }
01619 
01620     saveindex = treenode->index;
01621     newindex = table->invperm[low];
01622     auxnode = treenode;
01623     do {
01624         auxnode->index = newindex;
01625         if (auxnode->parent == NULL ||
01626                 (int) auxnode->parent->index != saveindex)
01627             break;
01628         auxnode = auxnode->parent;
01629     } while (1);
01630     return;
01631 
01632 } /* end of ddMergeGroups */
01633 
01634 
01645 static void
01646 ddDissolveGroup(
01647   DdManager * table,
01648   int  x,
01649   int  y)
01650 {
01651     int topx;
01652     int boty;
01653 
01654     /* find top and bottom of the two groups */
01655     boty = y;
01656     while ((unsigned) boty < table->subtables[boty].next)
01657         boty = table->subtables[boty].next;
01658     
01659     topx = table->subtables[boty].next;
01660 
01661     table->subtables[boty].next = y;
01662     table->subtables[x].next = topx;
01663 
01664     return;
01665 
01666 } /* end of ddDissolveGroup */
01667 
01668 
01679 static int
01680 ddNoCheck(
01681   DdManager * table,
01682   int  x,
01683   int  y)
01684 {
01685     return(0);
01686 
01687 } /* end of ddNoCheck */
01688 
01689 
01703 static int
01704 ddSecDiffCheck(
01705   DdManager * table,
01706   int  x,
01707   int  y)
01708 {
01709     double Nx,Nx_1;
01710     double Sx;
01711     double threshold;
01712     int    xindex,yindex;
01713 
01714     if (x==0) return(0);
01715 
01716 #ifdef DD_STATS
01717     secdiffcalls++;
01718 #endif
01719     Nx = (double) table->subtables[x].keys;
01720     Nx_1 = (double) table->subtables[x-1].keys;
01721     Sx = (table->subtables[y].keys/Nx) - (Nx/Nx_1);
01722 
01723     threshold = table->recomb / 100.0;
01724     if (Sx < threshold) {
01725         xindex = table->invperm[x];
01726         yindex = table->invperm[y];
01727         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01728 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01729             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Second difference for %d = %g Pos(%d)\n",
01730             table->invperm[x],Sx,x);
01731 #endif
01732 #ifdef DD_STATS
01733             secdiff++;
01734 #endif
01735             return(1);
01736         } else {
01737 #ifdef DD_STATS
01738             secdiffmisfire++;
01739 #endif
01740             return(0);
01741         }
01742 
01743     }
01744     return(0);
01745 
01746 } /* end of ddSecDiffCheck */
01747 
01748 
01759 static int
01760 ddExtSymmCheck(
01761   DdManager * table,
01762   int  x,
01763   int  y)
01764 {
01765     DdNode *f,*f0,*f1,*f01,*f00,*f11,*f10;
01766     DdNode *one;
01767     int comple;         /* f0 is complemented */
01768     int notproj;        /* f is not a projection function */
01769     int arccount;       /* number of arcs from layer x to layer y */
01770     int TotalRefCount;  /* total reference count of layer y minus 1 */
01771     int counter;        /* number of nodes of layer x that are allowed */
01772                         /* to violate extended symmetry conditions */
01773     int arccounter;     /* number of arcs into layer y that are allowed */
01774                         /* to come from layers other than x */
01775     int i;
01776     int xindex;
01777     int yindex;
01778     int res;
01779     int slots;
01780 #ifdef __osf__
01781 #pragma pointer_size save
01782 #pragma pointer_size short
01783 #endif
01784     DdNode **list;
01785 #ifdef __osf__
01786 #pragma pointer_size restore
01787 #endif
01788 
01789     xindex = table->invperm[x];
01790     yindex = table->invperm[y];
01791 
01792     /* If the two variables do not interact, we do not want to merge them. */
01793     if (!cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex))
01794         return(0);
01795 
01796 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01797     /* Checks that x and y do not contain just the projection functions.
01798     ** With the test on interaction, these test become redundant,
01799     ** because an isolated projection function does not interact with
01800     ** any other variable.
01801     */
01802     if (table->subtables[x].keys == 1) {
01803         assert(table->vars[xindex]->ref != 1);
01804     }
01805     if (table->subtables[y].keys == 1) {
01806         assert(table->vars[yindex]->ref != 1);
01807     }
01808 #endif
01809 
01810 #ifdef DD_STATS
01811     extsymmcalls++;
01812 #endif
01813 
01814     arccount = 0;
01815     counter = (int) (table->subtables[x].keys *
01816               (table->symmviolation/100.0) + 0.5);
01817     one = DD_ONE(table);
01818 
01819     slots = table->subtables[x].slots;
01820     list = table->subtables[x].nodelist;
01821     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
01822         f = list[i];
01823         while (f != NULL) {
01824             /* Find f1, f0, f11, f10, f01, f00. */
01825             f1 = cuddT(f);
01826             f0 = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
01827             comple = Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f));
01828             notproj = f1 != one || f0 != one || f->ref != (DdHalfWord) 1;
01829             if (f1->index == yindex) {
01830                 arccount++;
01831                 f11 = cuddT(f1); f10 = cuddE(f1);
01832             } else {
01833                 if ((int) f0->index != yindex) {
01834                     /* If f is an isolated projection function it is
01835                     ** allowed to bypass layer y.
01836                     */
01837                     if (notproj) {
01838                         if (counter == 0)
01839                             return(0);
01840                         counter--; /* f bypasses layer y */
01841                     }
01842                 }
01843                 f11 = f10 = f1;
01844             }
01845             if ((int) f0->index == yindex) {
01846                 arccount++;
01847                 f01 = cuddT(f0); f00 = cuddE(f0);
01848             } else {
01849                 f01 = f00 = f0;
01850             }
01851             if (comple) {
01852                 f01 = Cudd_Not(f01);
01853                 f00 = Cudd_Not(f00);
01854             }
01855 
01856             /* Unless we are looking at a projection function
01857             ** without external references except the one from the
01858             ** table, we insist that f01 == f10 or f11 == f00
01859             */
01860             if (notproj) {
01861                 if (f01 != f10 && f11 != f00) {
01862                     if (counter == 0)
01863                         return(0);
01864                     counter--;
01865                 }
01866             }
01867 
01868             f = f->next;
01869         } /* while */
01870     } /* for */
01871 
01872     /* Calculate the total reference counts of y */
01873     TotalRefCount = -1; /* -1 for projection function */
01874     slots = table->subtables[y].slots;
01875     list = table->subtables[y].nodelist;
01876     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
01877         f = list[i];
01878         while (f != NULL) {
01879             TotalRefCount += f->ref;
01880             f = f->next;
01881         }
01882     }
01883 
01884     arccounter = (int) (table->subtables[y].keys *
01885                  (table->arcviolation/100.0) + 0.5);
01886     res = arccount >= TotalRefCount - arccounter;
01887 
01888 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01889     if (res) {
01890         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Found extended symmetry! x = %d\ty = %d\tPos(%d,%d)\n",
01891             xindex,yindex,x,y);
01892     }
01893 #endif
01894 
01895 #ifdef DD_STATS
01896     if (res)
01897         extsymm++;
01898 #endif
01899     return(res);
01900 
01901 } /* end ddExtSymmCheck */
